ability: 【A】 When a Climax is placed into your Climax Slot, choose 1 of your Character, during this turn, it gets ＋1000 Power.
【S】 CONCENTRATION ［① REST this card］ Flip the top 4 cards of your Deck, place them into Waiting Room. For each Climax among those cards, draw up to 1 card.

name: “真名”黒のライダー
flavor_text: いーからいーから！ね、ね、ね？
ability: 【A】 At the beginning of your opponent's Attack Phase, you may move this card into an empty slot in the Front Row.

name: “歩き出す運命”ルーラー
flavor_text: この戦いの規律を守る義務があります
ability: 【A】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《マスター》 or 《サーヴァント》 or 《ホムンクルス》 Character, during this turn, it gets ＋Ｘ Power. Ｘ is equal to the number of your other 《マスター》 or 《サーヴァント》 or 《ホムンクルス》 Character ×500.

name: “歩き出す運命”ジーク
ability: 【C】 This card cannot Side Attack.

name: “狂化”黒のバーサーカー
flavor_text:
ダ―ニック「では、残る二騎の戦いはお前た
ちに任せよう」
ability: 【C】 For each of your other 《マスター》 or 《サーヴァント》 Character, this
card gets ＋500 Power.

name: “迎撃”黒のアーチャー
flavor_text: アタランテ「何!?……向こうのアーチャーか」
ability: 【C】 SUPPORT All your Characters in front of this card get +X Power. X is equals to that Character's Level ×500.
【S】［① REST this card］ Choose 1 of your opponent's Character at Front Row, during this turn, it gets −2000 Power.

name: “意志”黒のセイバー
flavor_text: だが、それでも……彼に捧げるべきものがある
ability: 【C】 For each of your other 《マスター》 or 《サーヴァント》 or 《ホムンクルス》 Character, this card gets ＋500 Power.
【A】 When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, you may place the top card of your Clock into Waiting Room.

name: 聖なる微笑
flavor_text: 貴方に命を捧げた優しい英雄が、いたからです
ability: 【C】 All your Characters get +1000 Power, +1 Soul.
(Arch：When this card is triggered, choose 1 Climax from your Waiting Room, you may return it to Hand)

name: シュトラセ・ゲーエン
flavor_text: だから、俺は……！
ability: 【C】 All your Characters get +2 Soul.
